hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: git_repo_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Repo url for chef source code.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: branch_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: branch name for the chef cookbook code.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cookbook_list
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
What cookbooks to test. Separated by comma.
If "ALL", all cookbooks under the given directory will be tested. Otherwise perform tests for given cookbooks.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: skip_cookbook_list
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: What cookbooks to skip test. Separated by whitespace.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: must_cookbook_list
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: What cookbooks to must test, no matter what. Separated by whitespace.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: env_parameters
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
export DOCKER_ENDPOINT='192.168.99.103:2376' export TLS_FOLDER=/Users/mac/.docker/machine/certs export PACKAGE_URL="http://192.168.99.1:8080/job/DeployChefCookbooks/ws/" export SIMULATE_NO_NETWORK=1 export LIGHTWEIGHT_TEST=1 export SKIP_CODE_UPDATE=true
export KEEP_FAILED_INSTANCE=false export KEEP_INSTANCE=false export CLEAN_START=false export REMOVE_BERKSFILE_LOCK=false export RUBYGEM_SOURCE="https://ruby.taobao.org/" export TEST_KITCHEN_YAML_BLACKLIST=".kitchen.vagrant.yml,.kitchen.digitalocean.yml,.kitchen_replicateSystem.yml"
